scripts.test: npm --workspace=@ryne/web run test && npm --workspace=@ryne/api run test
scripts.lint: npm --workspace=@ryne/web run lint && npm --workspace=@ryne/api run lint
scripts.type-check: npm --workspace=@ryne/web run type-check && npm --workspace=@ryne/api run type-check
scripts.docs:typedoc: bash -c 'mkdir -p site/typedoc && (cd apps/web && npx typedoc --tsconfig tsconfig.json --entryPoints src --entryPointStrategy expand --skipErrorChecking --out ../../site/typedoc/web) && (cd apps/api && npx typedoc --tsconfig tsconfig.json --entryPoints src --entryPointStrategy expand --skipErrorChecking --out ../../site/typedoc/api)'
scripts.docs: rimraf site && npm run docs:typedoc && npm run docs:openapi && npm run docs:site
scripts.deploy:rules:dev: cp firebase/firestore.rules.dev firebase/firestore.rules && npx firebase --project shyft-xphli --config firebase.json deploy --only firestore:rules
scripts.deploy:rules:prod: cp firebase/firestore.rules.prod firebase/firestore.rules && npx firebase --project shyft-xphli --config firebase.json deploy --only firestore:rules
scripts.dev: npm run dev:api & npm run dev:web
scripts.build: npm --workspace=@ryne/api run build && npm --workspace=@ryne/web run build
